sentences.en: A new type of germanic zeolite was synthesized in hydrothermal system.
sentences.cn: 在水热体系中合成了一种新型全锗沸石分子筛.

sentences.en: Argument against a hydrothermal origin is the sympathetic distribution of uranium and gold.
sentences.cn: 反对热液成固的理由是铀和金有着一致的分布.

sentences.en: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture - controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.cn: 半坡锑矿床是典型的断裂控矿,热液充填型矿床.

sentences.en: In all hydrothermal deposits the minerals formed are not solely the sulfide ore minerals.
sentences.cn: 在所有热液矿床中,所形成的矿物并不单单是硫化物矿石矿物.

sentences.en: It belongs to the micrograined Au deposit of structural hydrothermal alteration type.
sentences.cn: 明显受构造、地层及岩性控制,属构造一热液蚀变岩型微粒金矿.

sentences.en: Major phases of mullite composite nanocrystalline was synthesized by hydrothermal crystallization method.
sentences.cn: 以天然矿为原料,用水热法制备了主晶相为莫来石复合纳米晶.

sentences.en: Mineralized hydrothermal water mainly originated from the atmospheric rainfall.
sentences.cn: 成矿热液的水主要来自大气降水.

sentences.en: Modern seafloor hydrothermal process is an important ore - forming process.
sentences.cn: 现代海底热液成矿作用是一种重要的成矿作用.

sentences.en: Petrological and mineralogical examinations of core material can be used to identify hydrothermal alterations.
sentences.cn: 岩芯的岩石学和矿物学研究也能用来鉴定水热蚀变.

sentences.en: Research results on growth of amethyst crystal by hydrothermal method are presented.
sentences.cn: 报道了水热法人工紫色水晶生长研究的结果.

sentences.en: Shangmanggang tectonic-altered rock type Au deposit is founded in south Lushui-Ruili region. The Au deposit is controlled by source bed, structure and hydrothermal solution.
sentences.cn: 滇西泸水—瑞丽地区南部的上芒岗金矿为该区新发现的构造蚀变岩型金矿，金源、构造、热液蚀变是主要的控矿因素。

sentences.en: The mechanism of forming the nanocrystalline was discussed in hydrothermal condition.
sentences.cn: 实验中还探讨了水热条件下晶粒的形成机理.

sentences.en: The most common synthesis technique of zeolite membranes - hydrothermal growthgrowth method, was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了制备沸石分子筛膜最常用的水热合成法.

sentences.en: The ore deposit can be named as subvolcanic hydrothermal garnet - diopside - magnetite deposit.
sentences.cn: 可把此矿床定名为次火山水热石榴子石-透辉石 - 磁铁矿矿床.

sentences.en: There are plenty sources of hydrothermal gold deposits in eastern Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.cn: 东昆仑分布有丰富的多种热液金矿床,成矿时代以印支期和燕山早期为主.

sentences.en: There exist two type mineral deposits including Fuzichong-type skarn deposit and Niuwei-type hydrothermal filling deposit in the Fuzichong Pb-Zn ore belt.
sentences.cn: 佛子冲铅锌成矿带包括两种矿床类型，即佛子冲式夕卡岩型矿床和牛卫式热液充填（交代）型矿床。

sentences.en: These indicates that gold was probably transported as [ AuCl 2 ] -, [ AuCl 4 ] -, or [ Aus ] - in hydrothermal solution.
sentences.cn: 金可能以 [ AuCl_ 2 ] ~ - 、 [ AuCl_ 4 ] ~ - 或[AuS ] ~ - 、 [AuS_2 ] ~-等络合物形式迁移.

phrases.tran_cn: 热液溶解作用；热水溶液
深海热泉；深海热液喷口
